TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IndentedTextWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

Docs.summary: Provides a text writer that can indent new lines by a tab string token.

remarks.format:
## Remarks IndentedTextWriter extends a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> by providing methods that insert a tab string and track the current indentation level. Text formatted with multiple indentation levels is useful for generated code, so this class is used by CodeDOM code generator implementations.
The tab string is the string that each indentation consists of. Typically the tab string contains white space.
> [!NOTE] > This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using an IndentedTextWriter to write text at different levels of indentation.
[!code-cs[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.codedom.compile_0_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.codedom.compile_0_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.codedom.compile_0_1.vb)]

Docs.permission: for full trust for the immediate caller. This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
for full trust for inheritors. This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public const string DefaultTabString;
.field public static literal string DefaultTabString

Docs.summary: Specifies the default tab string. This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default tab string consists of a single white space. (" ")

Docs.permission: for full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Indent { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Indent

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the number of spaces to indent.
Docs.value: The number of spaces to indent.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates setting the indentation level of an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.IndentedTextWriter>. The indentation level is the number of tab strings to prefix each line with.
[!code-cs[IndentedTextWriterExample#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.codedom.compile_3_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.codedom.compile_3_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.codedom.compile_3_1.vb)]

remarks.format:

[!code-cs[IndentedTextWriterExample#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.codedom.compile_4_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#6](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.codedom.compile_4_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#6](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.codedom.compile_4_1.vb)]
